short_summary: Replacing boat ramp with installation of reinforced concrete
description: Project involve the replacement of the existing boat ramp at Botsford public wharf with installation of a new reinforced concrete ramp
full_summary:
**Botsford Harbour – Boat Ramp Replacement, Murray Corner, New Brunswick**

**Tender Notice**

Notice reference: PW-22-01018265, Amendment Number: 3, Solicitation Number: 30003890

[Header image or logo]

**Project Overview**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the replacement of the existing boat ramp at Botsford Harbour, located in Murray Corner, Westmorland County, New Brunswick. The project includes the reconstruction of the existing ramp, including excavation, geotextile filter fabric, rock fills, sub-base materials, rip-rap, rebar, and cast-in-place concrete.

**Measurable Work**

The contract includes the following measurable work:

* Temporary water control structures
* Dewatering
* Demolition of the existing ramp and adjacent timber crib
* Removal and disposal of demolished materials
* Construction of a new reinforced concrete ramp
* Asphalt paving, including new gravel and asphalt base and seal

**Incidental Work**

All other work necessary to complete the contract, including site restoration and cleanup, are considered incidental to the project and will not be measured separately for payment.

**Bid Deadline**

Bids must be submitted electronically through [Canada Buy Service website] no later than January 12, 2023, 13:00 Eastern Standard Time.

**Tender Documents**

Please refer to the attached documents for full project details, specifications, and drawings.

**Important Dates**

* Bid deadline: January 12, 2023, 13:00 EST
* Project completion date: July 18, 2023 (July 12, 2023 for certain items)

**Contact Information**

Kimberly Walker
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
DFOtenders-SoumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton NB E3C 2M6

Any clarifications or a test please go ahead to ask.  Well formatted markdown bid the respected sections. Word
